name: tiredspace
description:
TIREDSPACE is a game that follows the story of Cola, a girl from Earth who deals with agoraphobia, her therapy robot Bocks, and Mocha, a girl from The Moon whose job is to replace the stars in the sky.

Unfortunately for Mocha, she is not very good at her job and finds herself crash landed on Earth, and ends up meeting Cola, who she asks to help her find the missing stars!

Cola is pretty reluctant to help her at first since that requires her to talk to people, but if she had a choice in the matter this game wouldn’t exist, now would it?

In this game you’ll talk to new(?) friends, explore a small town, and of course, collect the stars and put them back in the sky.

THINGS TO NOTE BEFORE PLAYING!!! the game is relatively light-hearted, but there is some content you should be aware of before playing! this game contains:

  • swearing
  • discussion of suicide (pretty vague, though)
  • some parts where the screen flashes/shakes (also not too bad afaik, but better safe than sorry!)
  • literally every character in this game is a lesbian. if you have a problem with that then just leave mate

Also, you can turn off music and sound effects by pressing f1, and there is a guide included in the download if you get lost somewhere!

SCRIPTS I USED TO MAKE THIS GAME

  • font change script from Lunarea
  • text sound effects by mobychan
  • 8 direction movement by JV Master
  • non-combat menu by mjshi
